entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Clyde River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -27.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clyde River Airport 3:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -27.7°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 0.0 km
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -30.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 35 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending early in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 early in the morning then light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 35 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38 with temperature rising to minus 35 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38 with temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
